Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. I'm sorry, but I'm in the
middle of something right now. Could I ask you
to wait a few minutes?
Sure! I'll wait.
Lemme help!
I'll come back later.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I won't be long. Please, have a seat on the sofa.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to keep you waiting. Work kept me busy
longer than I had expected.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What brings you here?
I just wanted to see you.
I just wanted to talk.
Just messing with you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You came to see an old fool like me? My
goodness.
<PAGE>
Such is the exuberance of today's youth,
it would seem.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
As it happens, I'm far more accustomed to
leading the dance, rather than following.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>And yet, I must say that I find your assertiveness
delightfully refreshing...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...If not a little overwhelming.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aha ha ha ha! You really don't understand what I
meant, do you? Sorry, sorry. If you don't, that's
perfectly all right.
<PAGE>
At times, I can't help myself from getting a little
carried away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>After a long day spent concentrating on work,
my tongue gets far more loose than is proper. I
must do something about that.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, I was talking to myself. Still...given how
pure and naive you are, I can't help but wonder if
you're even aware of the power you possess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I may be appreciative of your candor, but it
doesn't do my blood pressure any favors at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah well. Perhaps it's your nature itself that is
such a potent weapon.
<PAGE>
I must ask that you rein it in, assuming such a
thing is even possible.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>
I'm feeling akin to a moth drawn to a flame, or a 
fly caught in a web. It's an unnerving experience.
<PAGE>
Frankly, it's difficult to concentrate on anything
else.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now do you understand? Have a care with that
smile of yours, if you please.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, that's more than enough excitement for
a man my age. I think it is time we call it a day.
<PAGE>
I still have some work to finish up, and your
presence is hardly conducive.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Whew. I think I'll need to sit down for a few
minutes...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? What would you need to say to me that
required you to come and wait for me to finish
working?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You just wanted to chat? Is that all? And here I
thought I might be called in as an impromptu
counselor for your romantic woes.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! I'm joking, of course.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I don't mind chatting, but I wouldn't expect
much, if I were you.
<PAGE>
I'm not especially familiar with the younger
generation's favorite subjects.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Well, if you insist. Why don't I put on some
coffee for us, first? I've come into possession of
some very tasty beans.
<PAGE>
You are the first one I'll have shared them with,
<MYNAME>. You are spending your valuable free
time on me, after all.
<PAGE>
It's only fair that I do something equivalent in
exchange. Wait right there. It won't take but a
minute.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You sit patiently and wait for me to finish my
work, and now you say it was just a...a prank?
You must have been very bored.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm afraid I have some work that I must finish
yet. If you don't need me for anything, I must
ask you to leave.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Er, sorry. This is my job, after all. Thank you for
the offer, though. Have a seat on the sofa. I
won't be long.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? <MYNAME> left? I did say I wouldn't be
long. I wonder what that was all about...
